summary:
Wallace & Gromit is a popular British animated series featuring a funny inventor, Wallace, and his clever dog, Gromit. Created by Nick Park, it began with a short film in 1989 and has since grown into a franchise with movies, spin-offs, and TV shows. Wallace loves cheese and talks a lot, while Gromit is silent but expressive.

The duo's adventures have made them famous worldwide, representing British culture. Their films are critically acclaimed, with perfect ratings for the first three shorts and the movie *The Curse of the Were-Rabbit*. A new feature film is coming in 2024. They've won many awards, including Oscars and BAFTAs.
title: Wallace & Gromit
